player.name: curl download - useragent referer
player.args: "{0}" | while read url do URL=`echo "$url" | grep -Eo '(http|https)://[a-zA-Z0-9:0-9./?=_-]*\.(mkv|mp4|m3u8|avi)'` USERAGENT=`echo "$url" | grep -Eo 'User-Agent=[a-zA-Z]*/[0-9]{1,1}\.[0-9]{1,1}(.[^&]*)'` REFERER=`echo "$url" | grep -Eo 'Referer=(http|https)://[a-zA-Z0-9./?=_-]*(/|\.html)' | sed 's/Referer=//'` curl -C - -A "$USERAGENT" -e "$REFERER" "$URL" -O "$HOME/Desktop/video-url-$(date +"%m-%d-%y-%H-%M").mkv" & done
